alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 4:37PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cache and northeastern Box Elder Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 436 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clarkston, or 15 miles northeast of Tremonton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cache, Smithfield, Lewiston, Clarkston, Trenton, Plymouth, Benson, Richmond, Newton, Amalga and Cornish. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
